::: {#hero-heading}

The Omaha Hulusi Ensemble, founded in April 2025, brings together Chinese music lovers of all ages and experience levels across the Omaha Metro area. The ensemble specializes in multi-part arrangements of both traditional and modern Chinese melodies. The group seeks to share the beauty of the hulusi and Chinese music through community performances and cultural exchange.

:::
